DOC.brief_summary: Real-Life Efficacy and Safety of Nivolumab monotherapy or in combination with Ipilimumab in Patients with Advanced (Unresectable or Metastatic) Melanoma
DOC.brief_title: Real-Life Efficacy and Safety of Nivolumab Monotherapy or in Combination With Ipilimumab in Patients With Advanced (Unresectable or Metastatic) Melanoma
